com.ephesoft.gxt.core.client.ui.widget.util

Class HTMLDomUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.gxt.core.client.ui.widget.util.HTMLDomUtil

  • public final class HTMLDomUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    A Utility Class which provides the functionality of making changes in the DOM structure of HTML Page. It uses native javascripts to make those changes.

    It provides functionality to modify content under the tag by its name,id etc.

    Author:
    Ephesoft

    • Method Detail

      • setContentByTagName

        public static void setContentByTagName(java.lang.String tagName,
                       java.lang.String value)
        Sets the tag content under the first tag found by tagName to the value passed as an argument.
        Parameters:
        tagName - String tagName under which the value is to be altered. If NULL, would be discarded.
        value - String value to be set for the tag.

      • setContentByTagName

        public static void setContentByTagName(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> tagMap)
        Sets the values under the tag with the name as Map Key to the values in the map.
        Parameters:
        tagMap - : Map Key Value pairs where key will be the tag Name and value will be the content to be set. If NULL or empty the request would be discarded.

      • setContentByTagID

        public static void setContentByTagID(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> tagMap)
        Sets the values under the tag with the ID as Map Key to the values in the map.
        Parameters:
        tagMap - : Map Key Value pairs where key will be the tag ID and value will be the content to be set. If null or empty the request would be discarded.

      • setContentByTagID

      • getFocusedElement

        public static com.google.gwt.dom.client.Element getFocusedElement()

        Returns:

      • getGrandChildren

        public static com.google.gwt.dom.client.NodeList<com.google.gwt.dom.client.Node> getGrandChildren(com.google.gwt.dom.client.Node grandParent,
                                                                                  int childNumber)
        Gets the grandChildren of a parent which is the nth child of a grandParent, where 'n' is the childNumber. If child number is less than 1 it returns the grand children of the last child of grandparent.
        Parameters:
        grandParent - Node Element whose grandChildren needs to be returned. When NULL , null is returned.
        childNumber - int childNumber of the child whose children neeeds to be returned.
        Returns:
        NodeList < @Node > which are all the grandChildren. NULL if child doesnot exist or has no children.
